response.overview: Most people don’t realize that right now there are thousands of satellites floating around our planet and that our modern way of life depends on them. Always Above explores how close space is to our daily lives and the role that the U.S. Space Force plays in launching, operating and defending these assets.  This 12-minute, visually stunning journey will take you thousands of miles into space. It is an inspiring, immersive experience for people of all ages who have ever looked to the skies and asked, “What’s up there?”
response.title: Always Above
